website_summaries.verdict: More effective than monthly tanning subscriptions, with an easy to use applicator.
pros: We love the machine's precision and ease of use for those new to at-home spray tanning
Designed for a longer lasting tan
cons: You may have to watch a few online tutorials to achieve desired results

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely GORGEOUS COLOR
customer_reviews.text: Blown away!!! This is an amazing amazing bronzer and the sprayer is easy to use. I look like I have been on the beach for a week it's gorgeous! I left my thong on just so I can see a difference and it is so amazing and it lasted for over a week probably 10 days And when it faded it didn't get all spotty... Just unbelievable! Get this!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: cece

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: So far it is great I have personally used it on myself 2 times and I have sprayed 3 others. It is amazing and easy to self use. I haven't had any issues with over spray and I dont use a tent. I just set it up in my bathroom . I haven't had any issues with clean up from over spray at all I love this machine and I would recommend it for sure it saves so much time and money from having to go to a salon and the privacy of being able to do it in your own home is simply wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Terri O.

customer_reviews.title: Love this money well spent my machine works great you ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this money well spent my machine works great you just need to make sure it’s thorough cleaned after each use I think that’s why people had issues with the sprayer only working once or twice just don’t be lazy people good hygiene and things will last color was very good too not orange at all and sprays on even afterwards a little rubbs off and you look very uneven but once you shower it evens back out
customer_reviews.author: aubrie

customer_reviews.title: Dirty and used. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: I received this today only to find out they sent me someone else's well-used return. The canisters/cups were full of tanning solution residue, everything appeared to have a light spray of it because my fingers turned brown just by handling it. And here's the real WTF.... They sent An applicator mitt that was used and still wet with tanning solution! I could hardly believe it. With this COVID virus running rampant they actually sent me something that someone else smeared all over their nooks and crannies. And I paid $200 for it. Run. Find a reputable seller. Unbelievably disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: JKG

customer_reviews.title: The machine is great and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The machine is great and easy to use! I don't love the solution it came with but I plan on purchasing the Norvell brand which seems to have great reviews. I would recommend this machine to anyone who goes to a salon more than twice a year - this is way better!!!
customer_reviews.author: Faye Radcliffe

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Love the ease of assembly - ease of cleaning - ease of using it to spray myself. I was very impressed my first try out. I need a little practice in some areas - but love the machines. I did not realize it came w/ 2 mits to help smooth out the spay - LOVE THEM. I personally did not use the solution that came with this system - someone recommend another brand, but I do plan to try this solution at some point as a comparison. Very pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki S.

customer_reviews.title: Buy it! You won't regret it!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a birthday present to myself after it was recommended by a blogger. I also purchased extra lotion and a tent. Seriously....I love this so much!! My whole family loves it!! I did order the sticky feet later to prevent stained tanned soles. We own a tanning bed and haven't even used it since we got this awesome machine!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Grabowski

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: Love this spray machine. Works so good! Great value. Spray tans are so expensive and now my husband sprays me at home and does a great job. Does take some time to learn correct technique but not hard to use at all. Easy to clean. They tanner that comes with it is also good. And does not give a fake ‘orange’ color. Tan looks natural.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love, love
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this machine! I was a little apprehensive at first but watched a few you tube videos on how to air brush spray tan. It is really easy and I can even do myself with no problems. Such a great investment. No more monthly mystic memberships. I even took my spray machine with me on vacation. Lol!
customer_reviews.author: Fitnessmk

customer_reviews.title: Extremely easy to set-up and use
customer_reviews.text: I did a ton of research on the MaxiMist amongst other spray tanning machines before purchasing and I have to say- this is TOP notch. I have been getting spray tans for over 10 years and just decided to make the switch to doing it myself at home. The system is extremely easy to set-up and use at home. All you need is an open space, I used the shower and gave it a go. There are plenty of videos you can watch online for how to get your spray down pat- but the overall efficacy of this machine is great! I am so excited to have one of my own, my tanning girl isn't as excited ;)
customer_reviews.author: addictedtoYA

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use, great for home use.
customer_reviews.text: This product is easy to use, right out of the box. It provides a great mist to distribute the solution; no blotches, even mist to cover all areas.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this spray gun for almost 4 years now. I use it weekly and it has held up very well. I haven't had any issues with it! I only use distilled water to clean it, and that keeps it working perfect! A great device for personal use. I am tan all year round!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Wiener

customer_reviews.title: Yes!
customer_reviews.text: This system is great! I am a redhead and cannot get a tan. I've used this twice and had no issues. My husband has also sprayed me and had no issues. I did not use the solution that came with it, so I cannot speak towards that. I ordered a different brand. Super easy to use and figure out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is the first machine I've owned by myself and I ABSOLUTELY love it! It comes with perfect detailed instructions and ...
customer_reviews.text: I have gotten spray tans my whole life, and I have helped give them before. This is the first machine I've owned by myself and I ABSOLUTELY love it! It comes with perfect detailed instructions and was so easy to use. I would guarantee this machine to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Thomas

customer_reviews.title: ... the sprayer on my wife and it did a good job. the only thing so far is when ...
customer_reviews.text: I used the sprayer on my wife and it did a good job. the only thing so far is when we opened the box to unpack, one of the solution bottle cap was loose. it poured about 1/2 of the bottle all inside of the box. the solution was all over everything. we cleaned up with rags and paper towels. the machine cleaned up ok but my hands are crazy brown. may take a few days to wear the tan off of my hands and fingers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Even though I have only used the machine once so far I highly recommend it. I had my husband spray me and he even said how easy it is to use. I used the solution it came with, I'm pretty fair skined and used the lightest color. It gave me a nice glow, not orange at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Set up is easy and clean up is just as easy
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worth it. This is a game changer. No longer need to book appointments to get spray tans or pay the high prices. This product does exactly what it says and performs just as well as a professional spray tan unit. Set up is easy and clean up is just as easy! I would recommend this to anyone and everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Angelika

customer_reviews.title: Poorly packaged - Looked used
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to receive the MaxiMist. However, it came in a beat up box. Once opened, it looked thrown in the box. The hose was poorly tapped and looked cheap and the machine itself was dusty and had scratches. For the amount paid, I expected better quality of packaging. I didn’t want to use as I did not know if it had been used before. Pretty disappointed with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Himes

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: i love this spray tanner. i upgraded to this after my old one stopped working. my old one was similar to the style of the st tropez spray tanner. when i got the maximist, i couldn't believe how much better it works! it's definitely bigger, but that makes it so much more powerful. i am able to spray myself in less than 5 minutes, and it goes on very evenly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great machine
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to learn how to spray tan. It’s really nice and has held up nice. I’ve only done 5 tans in one setting but it worked fine. Great machine
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie

customer_reviews.title: The spray tanning system leaks. I can not regulate ...
customer_reviews.text: The spray tanning system leaks. I can not regulate the pressure and tanning solution shoots out of the top of the container. I will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: x

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing and I never leave reviews! My tan came out so nice and has faded so even! It's amazing, night and day from using just a mit. Watch YouTube videos on how to spray yourself or have someone learn how to spray you and you're set! Where I live spray tans are at least 30$ so this pays for itself! I thought there would be a learning curve but my first spray came out amazing! Love it, love it, love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value. Easy to use. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. The directions are a little misleading. You need more than 2 oz in the container, even if you only use 2 oz fill up more, you want a steady spray. The 4 inches away recommendation... more like 8. The solution is nice and has no order, however, only last about 4 days. Will keep it but get South Seas Tanning solution instead.
customer_reviews.author: breckan92

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Love this spray tanning system! Purchased this one because of price as well as the great reviews it got! I have to say, I’ve only used it twice so far and absolutely love it! I love getting spray tans and spend too much money on going to a salon so this was a great find for myself!! I’m still learning to use it on myself but am so happy and excited to have it!!
customer_reviews.author: kelsey84

customer_reviews.title: Reccomend
customer_reviews.text: A little practice and everything was easy! I am spraying everyone around me now haha, no but they are all asking lol
customer_reviews.author: S.stewart

customer_reviews.title: 2nd machine, leaks!!!
customer_reviews.text: 2nd machine, leaks!!! I thought it was just a bad machine, so I got a 2nd machine and it leaks where the cup connects to machine. Wasted money on this. Too late to return :(
customer_reviews.author: AstroTurfhurts

customer_reviews.title: Good so far!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this product! I have used it about 6 times. Sometimes I feel as though no solution is coming out of the gun even though I have the trigger pulled for a moment or two then it starts working again. I'm not sure if this could be my error since I am new at this--so I did not deduct stars. I am also happy with the solution color.
customer_reviews.author: Lora Boysel

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I have used it around 4 times and so far I am happy with the results. It’s easy to use. I bought it to use at home so it’s perfect for that!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: I love this product I did not use the solution that ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this product I did not use the solution that it came with I used a different brand the machine is very easy to setup and very easy to use takes a couple tries to get used to spring yourself
customer_reviews.author: Miriah rose

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: The directions don’t give much insight. Watch some online videos about spraying. It works well and is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney R.

customer_reviews.title: Aussie Bronze; gorgeous brown
customer_reviews.text: Good product, easy to use/get started, and great customer service. I would recommend this product. I also loved the "Aussie Bronze" tanning solution that was included; nice Golden Brown and not that ugly "orange" at all.
customer_reviews.author: Midwest Glam

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Hoses don’t last and are way to expensive to replace constantly Second machine I purchased sprays tan everywhere and drips awful. Gonna try to contact maxi mist and get a replacement
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: I've had the machine for 3 months; have done ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had the machine for 3 months; have done maybe 10-12 tans... and its not working well the last few times. Stops spraying during the middle of a tan; air still comes out but the solution wont. Turn off the machine for 10 minutes and it will work for another minute or so then stop again. Certainly not made for 10 tans a day! I just want it to do one a week! :(
customer_reviews.author: awesome

customer_reviews.title: I am happy with my purchase and will save a lot of ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well for the two times I have used it. I am happy with my purchase and will save a lot of money by spray tanning at home instead of salon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Needs better packaging
customer_reviews.text: I’m excited to use this, however the packaging was disappointing. One of the solutions leaked out in the box and on the contents. The three solutions were just thrown in. It seems as if they should have included a separate package within the bigger box or put the solutions in bags to prevent this.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, easy to clean. Does a good job. A little hard to get the adjustments right. Other then that no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Page

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value
customer_reviews.text: Amazing value, and quality equipment. More than I was expecting. Arrived on time in just two days too. Sample solutions were included, and tan last longer than Al all other solutions I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to make extra income!!
customer_reviews.text: I love it!! So easy and fun to use it and so easy to clean it!!
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: Tanfastic!!!
customer_reviews.text: Product works like a charm!!!! Better than I expected . Easy to operate and even warms the air! Highly recommend !
customer_reviews.author: Jah

customer_reviews.title: so good! Wouldn't rec the solution it comes with and ...
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good! Wouldn't rec the solution it comes with and still learning about it. I've been dying for it and now I need someone to spray me. Had it done once and liked it. Quick spray on the face helps in a pinch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Great machine. There is a learning curve but YouTube has plenty of videos to show you how to get the right technique. It takes some practice but it's worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Doles

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: The product will spray on a little splotchy, but don't worry- when you shower off it gives you a perfect tan.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The spray drips on your body causing tan lines on your skin. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Designer4Divas

customer_reviews.title: Price is the best spray tan machine
customer_reviews.text: No need to explain anymore. Price is the best spray tan machine. I bought two
customer_reviews.author: oanes777

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful machine! It is very easy to use and my tan looks great! Very happy customer! I wish I would have purchased this a long time ago.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Broke After 2 Uses
customer_reviews.text: Used 2 times and looked great! I followed instructions when cleaned after every use. It stopped spraying 3rd use. Too much money to only work twice. But I did love the results.
customer_reviews.author: Jason A. Sharpe

customer_reviews.title: ... it for the first time today and I absolutely LOVE it!
customer_reviews.text: Used it for the first time today and I absolutely LOVE it!!! Would definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Tasha Nation

customer_reviews.title: Best results!
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine! So easy to use. Great results with half of The price of a salon. The machine was ordered on a Saturday and I had it by Monday. Great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: marisa mcbride

customer_reviews.title: Clumsy
customer_reviews.text: Does not offer a consistent spray. When you first apply a ton comes out then, nothing. Very inconsistent spray.
customer_reviews.author: Linsey Strom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing! Always order from you and have been receiving amazing results!
customer_reviews.author: elena m.

customer_reviews.title: Great At-Home Tanning Product!
customer_reviews.text: Instructions were super easy to follow and the spray was really even. I am very happy with this purchase and I look forward to saving money by being able to tan at home!
customer_reviews.author: Emily K.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Spray tan machine and solution were very good. I am very happy with how easy it is to use. And I like the color of the tan
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have been really happy with the MaxiMist Lite. The set up and application could not be easier for an at home tanning system. I would highly recommend ordering and having the convince of spray tanning right in your own home!
customer_reviews.author: Meg A.

customer_reviews.title: It is a great value
customer_reviews.text: Like it a lot. It takes some practice to perfect it.
customer_reviews.author: Misty Locklear

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product!! Maximist makes tanning super easy now. My wife loves this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this spray tan machine!! Color lasts about 5 days. Color is natural looking too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Smaller than i expected but that is great! Love it love it
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than what i expected, but works just like I hoped! I need practice but thats not the machines fault lol. It worked great! Took me a little bit to get the gun dialed in, so it wouldn't spray the whole cup of tanning fluid out in less than a minute lol. Turn the knob on the gun towards the minus sign. I couldn't be more happy with this purchase. A great investment! Saves me from spending $30 bucks a pop at a salon. And i can do it in my home. With the tent you don't have to worry about overspray, its not that crazy. Small, convenient, looks just like a salon spray tan!
customer_reviews.author: Ketz85

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it! It's so easy to use & gives the tan you would pay for in a salon. Easy to assemble & perfect for people that get spray tans often to save money. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Morghan Pickering

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love my spray tan machine. Very easy to use and very professional
customer_reviews.author: Juan Leon

customer_reviews.title: One of the best investments I've ever made.
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping, fantastic product. Could not be happier with it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and use! Perfect for home use with a salon result!
customer_reviews.author: Jessi T

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Sunless tanning  option!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely professional product here. Does EVERYTHING it says it does, and more!! Purchased for my wife who was recently diagnosed with skin cancer and needs to eliminate sun tanning from her life, completely. She came out looking like a bronzed beach bunny after one application. Couldn't be more pleased with this product, the price, and highly recommend to anyone looking for a sunless tanning option with incredible results.
customer_reviews.author: thomas pierce

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This spray tan machine is very easy to use! I love the natural even tan it gives you!
customer_reviews.author: Bmcclure1186@gmail.con

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase and love the results
customer_reviews.text: Was nervous to spend this much in a tanning machine but worth every penny!! Best purchase and love the results.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Great for home use.
customer_reviews.text: So far this system is exactly what I was looking for and I'm thrilled with it. Just wish I'd done it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: kathy spradley

customer_reviews.title: Terrible condition
customer_reviews.text: As you can see by the photos, the machine I got was extremely dirty and dusty. It was also sticky to the touch I’m pretty disappointed and disgusted.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with this product. Easy to set up, and use.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Hunziker

customer_reviews.title: Buy this!
customer_reviews.text: Sprays light and evenly- an upgrade from what I was using! I had purchased a cheapie before and when the gun broke I couldn't just replace the gun! Spring for this maxi mist, should anything happen you know you can find replacement parts for it!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffani

customer_reviews.title: A+ maxi mist. F amazon shipping.
customer_reviews.text: I originally ordered this item with prime on a Sunday. As of the following Friday my order had been packaged but not picked up by ups. After dealing with a hot mess of Amazon I finally placed a new order and a week and a few days later I finally received my product. This was at no fault to the actual company supplying the machine but more so on amazon. Machine did come a little banged up but works just fine. Instructions were easy to understand and set up was very easy. I do recommend buying the tent as well because I did not and will be placing a separate order for one.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Beutel

customer_reviews.title: Great tanning machine!
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine! I bought one a year ago and ended up gifted it to my sister but turns out I couldn't live without it so I bought another. I get a perfect tan with this machine and I LOVE the Tampa Bay tan solution it comes with too.
customer_reviews.author: Laural

customer_reviews.title: This machine worked great, my husband sprayed me
customer_reviews.text: This machine worked great, my husband sprayed me, which is my first spray tan, the tan turned out very even, no runs or blotting i ordered norvell tanning liquid which is what i used for the first spray
customer_reviews.author: crystal

customer_reviews.title: Love it!  Totally worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was very fast and it came pretty much already completely assembled. Super easy to figure out how to use, the tanning solutions it came with give you a nice deep color with no orange tint and last a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Whipple

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Watched a few YouTube videos and have ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Watched a few YouTube videos and have been spraying myself for awhile now. Such a great way to save money if you like to spray tan. You can do it it is so easy I'm sad I wasted so much money going to someone else all those tines
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Michel

customer_reviews.title: We use key west rayz tanning solution with it and it looks great. No streaking
customer_reviews.text: Never tried spray tanning before and haven't had any problems with the machine! Takes one or two times to get the hang of. We use key west rayz tanning solution with it and it looks great. No streaking, no orange tint.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: I love this machine
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine. This was my first spray tan ever and it turned out great! Of course you get better with time and you have to experiment with the color to see whats best for your skin tone. My mother sprays me and she cant see all that well and it still turns out great and its very easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Candie Sane

customer_reviews.title: Great product gives a even tan
customer_reviews.text: Great product gives a even tan..just make sure you get this machine with the tent because of the fan inside machine the spray really flies all over but the tent helps very much....
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: terrible
customer_reviews.text: I am so upset with the results of this product. What a mess does not do ANYTHING that it says it does. The tan looks like 1000 little dots and looks like i have a skin problem. Horrible i am returning this to get another kind from a different company.
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product. I was super excited to use it. Well I got it today, I didn't receive the spray gun so now I can't use it. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: This purchase was an upgrade from my previous, less expensive spray tanning system. I am so impressed by this unit . It is very easy to operate and clean. It sprays beautifully and very even. The tan itself last much longer than the brands I have used in the past. It also "fades" evenly unlike others. This one is not the cheapest system out there, but it is worth the money. I would highly recommend this product. I am a natural red head and the 8% solution looks very natural . Easy clean up and comes with additional replacement parts. I can have my hubby spray me in under 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Sheppard

customer_reviews.title: Thrilled With This Tanning System!!!
customer_reviews.text: Have been using a different system for the past 4 years. Was never that happy with it. Used my new MaxiMist Lite last night and the results were great. My hubby is the one that sprays me, and he loves this system. With a little practice, he will be spraying like a pro in no time. Probably the best tan I've had is with this system. We are both very happy we went with the MaxiMist Lite. We researched so many different tanning systems before we made the switch, and both of us are very happy we did. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Tays Mom

customer_reviews.title: Super pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to start my mobile spray tanning business and couldn't be happier. This is an excellent beginner's machine. I purchased it with the intention of upgrading after business picks up and keeping this as a backup in case my main machine goes down, but see no reason to use a machine other than this one. Purchased this one instead of the bigger kit that included the tent because this one had prime shipping when the other didn't and just purchased a tent separately. The kit came with everything I need, including extra cups for solution and an extra filter. Easy to disassemble for cleaning after use, super easy to use. Just wish the cord was a little longer.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Stallons

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect spray tan machine. The gun was easy to assemble, adjust and clean. It makes for a very fast full-body Spraytan in a matter of 5-8 minutes. I highly recommend using a different spray tan solution. I use Norvell, but use whatever you prefer. Great product, great price and the shopping was so quick!
customer_reviews.author: Davis Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous tan in minutes.
customer_reviews.text: The unit came exactly as prescribed. So easy to assemble and so EASY to use. I am fair skin and the 8 was perfect. I can get away with the 10, but the 12 is def for skin that is darker to start with. If you are fair skinned an 8 will be perfect. It sprays on evenly and so easily. My husband and I were able to spray each other the day we got it without practice. This is an awesome find. It comes to about $2.00 a spray when a salon charges in excess of $30. Instantly tan for any event. I LOVE my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great way to tan at home!!
customer_reviews.text: I use this once a week and the color and application are always great! I haven't tried the tanning solution that came with it as I read bad reviews on it, so I use Norvell instead and the color and coverage is great!
customer_reviews.author: Sandee Starks

customer_reviews.title: Stop wasting your money and spray yourself!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. I recently started being spray tanned at $30/session. I figured this system would more than pay for itself. Super easy to use. I spray myself or my husband sprays me! Customs service seems to be excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Bush

customer_reviews.title: Not having luck with this MaxiMist
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had other MaxiMist units & I’m not having luck with this. As instructed, I calibrated machine before using. I adjusted the gun so more spray would come out onto my client. Instead it’s now dripping from the cup all over ground & client.
customer_reviews.author: rothgirl

customer_reviews.title: but each and every item in the box was covered in a thick layer of dust and was in poor shape. I do not see the point in ...
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to receive this product, but each and every item in the box was covered in a thick layer of dust and was in poor shape. I do not see the point in spending close to $200 for a machine that looks like it's spent a long time on a dusty warehouse shelf and then thrown around before it came to me.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for professional or home use!
customer_reviews.text: You need this. Hands down. You need this. I actually use it on myself once a week unless I can con my husband into giving me a spare tan, then he does. ;) I love this! I used all the solutions it come with- a nice way to tweak the perfect color by having different options. It's SO easy to clean. Each time I use it, I run clean water in it for about a minute and it has run smoothly every time I've used it.
customer_reviews.author: MV's Momma

customer_reviews.title: Can’t get in touch with customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I would have given it 5 stars except that I have been trying unsuccessfully contact the company regarding the spring and button on the trigger does not function properly. I have it adjusted as far open as it will go and it will not spray. I have to remove it completely and that makes it spray a lot!
customer_reviews.author: working mother

customer_reviews.title: Great for Price!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Easy to use and, light weight & easy to travel with. I’ve owned other spray tanning equipment and this one is great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Loooooove this machine!!!
customer_reviews.text: Came with no problems seriously love this machine I own a spray tab business and needed this asap and it got here quick and had no problems with it! Works like a freak and my client is happy and loves their tan!! If your thinking about buying it just do it!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Benson

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Works very well and goes great with Norvell tanning solution! I would recommend a 3 prong extension cord. Some times there isn’t a plug as close as you need it to be!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Horn

customer_reviews.title: New and Excited
customer_reviews.text: I'm new my machine and still practicing but excited. The set up was super easy and the extra canisters make it easy to quickly switch between solutions if necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Kay

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble, fill and operate. Great speed and results. Came with easy to follow instructions & good tips.
customer_reviews.author: ann

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Love the tanning solution (does not feel ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Love the tanning solution (does not feel sticky or rub off on your clothes) and the machine is very easy to use! I will have a beautiful tan all year, so glad I purchased!!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa A.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE!! SO AMAZING AND WILL DO BUSINESS WITH AGAIN!!
customer_reviews.author: Alisha Stoutenberg

customer_reviews.title: Great tan.
customer_reviews.text: Love the fact that it gives you such a deep tan . Takes a little practice . Wish I bought one years ago!
customer_reviews.author: Malibu

customer_reviews.title: Great product/price
customer_reviews.text: I have only used it once so far but it was easy to set-up and use. The sample tanning solutions worked good and wife is completely happy with her new tan.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Haynes

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with purchase and it was very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: They sprays are very dark. They could last longer. About three days and then four...you are pretty light .
customer_reviews.author: M. Welch

product_meta.title: MaxiMist Lite Plus HVLP Spray Tanning System
feature_bullets: OVER 10,000 SOLD ! - Home/Mobile/Backup unit for 10 plus applications a day. Very Beginner Friendly on board gun storage Lightweight Mobile design.
Detailed Instruction Manual CE, EU, ECAL Certifications Spare parts kit included free Complete New HVLP System ready to spray out of the box
Spray Gun with horizontal and vertical pattern and flow adjustments Non-stick needle for virtually clog free performance

Includes Tampa Bay Tan Spray Tanning Products that are 100% Vegan, Not Tested On Animals Paraben, Soy and Gluten Free Made with Natural Organic Ingredients Manufactured and Formulated by Tampa Bay Tan and Shipped FRESH! Three Solution color levels to choose from, 8% (lt/med) 10% (med/dark) and 12% (dark) Everthing you need to get started.
Comes with three, 5 oz cups, conical design, and wide base for optimal solution pickup 1 year warranty on Turbine Motor
